custom-sql.sql: SELECT any_value(gtfs_Trip.id_) as id_, gtfs_Trip.route_id, any_value(gtfs_Trip.service_id) as service_id, any_value(gtfs_Trip.trip_id) as trip_id, gtfs_Trip.trip_headsign FROM gtfs_Trip INNER JOIN gtfs_StopTime ON gtfs_StopTime.trip_id = gtfs_Trip.trip_id INNER JOIN gtfs_Calendar ON gtfs_Calendar.service_id = gtfs_Trip.service_id WHERE DATE(gtfs_Calendar.start_date) <= ADDDATE(DATE(NOW()), INTERVAL 3 MONTH) AND DATE(DATE(NOW())) <= IF(DATE(gtfs_Calendar.end_date) > ADDDATE(DATE(NOW()), INTERVAL 3 MONTH), ADDDATE(DATE(NOW()), INTERVAL 3 MONTH), DATE(gtfs_Calendar.end_date)) AND gtfs_StopTime.stop_id = ? GROUP BY gtfs_Trip.route_id, gtfs_Trip.trip_headsign
